gemini_config.system_instruction: Write a compelling vision statement about where I see [project/work] going in the next 2-3 years and how sponsors can be part of that journey.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Write a compelling vision statement about where I see [project/work] going in the next 2-3 years and..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
